title: Kyler vs. Rodgers; Derrick Henry vs. Jim Brown; Hyped weekend matchups
itunes:title: Kyler vs. Rodgers; Derrick Henry vs. Jim Brown; Hyped weekend matchups
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Tiki Barber preview the Thursday Night Football matchup between the Arizona Cardinals, without JJ Watt, and the Green Bay Packers ,without Davante Adams; then they explore their favorite weekend matchups and share which games they're most hyped to watch; they also go 'Back in Time' and compare the production of Derrick Henry to the production of Jim Brown; and lastly, they all call their shot in Cardinals - Packers game.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
